special_abilities.name: Source.
descriptions: tales from the yawning portal,  page 242

special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
descriptions: The sea lion can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell.
descriptions: The sea lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
descriptions: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Swimming Leap.
descriptions: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The sea lion makes three attacks: one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage
